module.name: fpg_command_intf
module.short: This unit defines the Command design pattern interfaces used by fpGUI

descr.p: . The Command design pattern is similar to the TActions from Delphi or Lazarus.

element.name: ICommand
element.descr: . Currently in only defines one procedure called Execute.

element.name: ICommandHolder
element.short: An interface that allows to Get or Set a Command
element.descr: . An example of a class that implements this interface is the TfpgBaseButton class.
